previewArticle.title: FC Dallas vs. New England Revolution | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: FC Dallas 2, New England Revolution 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: FC Dallas will be looking to keep pace in the tight Western Conference when they entertain the New England Revolution aiming to halt a recent slide when the clubs face off Saturday at Toyota Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: FC Dallas vs. New England Revolution

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: RevGunner
timelineItems.text: Big Caldwell fan. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ginger Beard
timelineItems.text: Take the shot!!! That was some great movement between Daigo and Lee #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Esteban Garcia
timelineItems.text: Game time #DTID @FCDallas http://t.co/66eBTVaTnF

timelineItems.name: Esteban Garcia
timelineItems.text: Game time #DTID @FCDallas http://t.co/66eBTVaTnF

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Not dwell on the past, but the Davies of old would've smoked Hedges on that giveaway. And then he would've scored. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Blas Perez (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Blas Perez fires it from center, but it goes wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Zach Loyd with a cross.

timelineItems.title: MISS: Blas Perez devastating header is  just high

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Honestly believe that Perez is the type of player that the #NEREVS need

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adam Moffat (FC Dallas).
Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: Like the possession, but we're noticing having one starting CB suspended and one injured and on the bench. At least it's 0-0 still. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Andres Escobar (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth excellent stop on fierce strike from Andres Escobar

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Andrés Escobar with a cross.
Attempt saved. Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Tesho Akindele.
Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.text: Your #FCDallas starting XI! #FCDvNE #DTID http://t.co/SqihOGV8j4

timelineItems.text: Your #FCDallas starting XI! #FCDvNE #DTID http://t.co/SqihOGV8j4

timelineItems.name: Melissa Westlund Franks
timelineItems.text: First MLS game #DTID @fcdallas

timelineItems.name: Linda C
timelineItems.text: enjoying the fabulous weather, getting ready to cheer our guys on to 3 more points!!! #dtid #fcdallas

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Victor Ulloa (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: R Haus
timelineItems.text: McCarthy most composed w/the ball defender we have. Caldwell very tidy as well. Contributing to hi poss. pct. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Adam Moffat (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Adam Moffat boots it hard from distance, but it is blocked in the center

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Scott Caldwell.
Match ends, FC Dallas 2, New England Revolution 0.

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | AFC NYC
timelineItems.text: Aaand it continues. Cheers, #NERevs. You never let me down re: letting me down.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Sullivan
timelineItems.text: ONE MORE LOSS AND WE RIOT. OR DO WE RIOT NOW? #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: Small Time Sports
timelineItems.text: Three points. #DTID

timelineItems.name: Rilgon Arcsinh
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME! @FCDALLAS WINS! #DTID

timelineItems.name: Enrique
timelineItems.text: 3 Points at home?? HOW ABOUT YES!!!!! #DTID

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Teshooooo. Colorado School of Mines product doin' work. #DALvNE #FCDallas

timelineItems.desc: FC Dallas were looking to keep pace in the tight Western Conference when they entertained the New England Revolution, aiming to halt a recent slide when the clubs faced off Saturday at Toyota Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: FC Dallas vs. New England Revolution | July 19, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@FCDallas young guns out on display as #NERevs drop their 7th straight game. http://t.co/INpRMHYk0n #DALvNE http://t.co/WbWeqMuW1b

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@FCDallas young guns out on display as #NERevs drop their 7th straight game. http://t.co/INpRMHYk0n #DALvNE http://t.co/WbWeqMuW1b

Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Erica Penunuri
timelineItems.text: Toyota stadium looking more packed than usual tonight - post World Cup effect? We've got until October to find out #fcdallas #soccer

timelineItems.name: Logan Cortez
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas ⚽️❤️ #DTID http://t.co/puxV0HYtDV

timelineItems.name: Logan Cortez
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas ⚽️❤️ #DTID http://t.co/puxV0HYtDV

timelineItems.name: Erica Penunuri
timelineItems.text: #fcdallas taking some blind shots at the goal, own players reflected shots; New England Revolution struggle to maintain possession #mls

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Jay Heaps HATES playing two strikers up top together. HATES it, I say. #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: R Haus
timelineItems.text: Just don't see how Bunbury fits in this team #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Adam Moffat with a through ball.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  FC Dallas 1, New England Revolution 0. Andres Escobar (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the top left of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Andres Escobar dribbles past defenders and fires it into the near corner

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Adam Moffat (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: They can't make the last pass. Come on, #NERevs. Davies has to get involved.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Hedges (FC Dallas).
Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: R Haus
timelineItems.text: This team cannot defend. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan
timelineItems.text: We can't score and we never get back #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mike Amrock
timelineItems.text: Escobar made Darrius Barnes look like me out there. #notgoodenough #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Andres Escobar (no, not that one), goes right by Darrius Barnes to blast the ball past Shuttleworth. Terrible defending from Revs. #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: Texas Gooner
timelineItems.text: How can people say escobar isnt worthy of a do contract?! The guy is castillo with a brain. INCREDIBLE GOAL #DTID

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Daigo Kobayashi long-distance blast goes wide

timelineItems.name: Geoff from the 'Rose
timelineItems.text: Okay, the hammer has to fall. I don't care if this is the middle of the season, but six going on seven? Axe someone. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: Andres Escobar has one steppover move and then cuts upfield, he's burned Barnes and Macca on it. #NERevs #DALvNE

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Blas Pérez (FC Dallas).
Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: Yikes...let's not make too many excuses for Bobby on that one. The team as a whole has gotta get their acts together, come on guys! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Not sure what's up with Jay Heaps's starting line-up tonight, but how on earth is Teal Bunbury still in the starting eleven? #DALvNE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Foul by Stephen McCarthy (New England Revolution).
Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, New England Revolution. Daigo Kobayashi tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: LeftD22
timelineItems.text: Serious ?: are Barnes and Alston any better now than when they were drafted? Development is so flat, likely a bit of regression. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Barnes struggled earlier in the week against Robbie Keane. Similar issue today with allowing too much space against speed #NEREVS

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Victor Ulloa (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Kade Wimberley
timelineItems.text: #DTID http://t.co/gKeaSBZZSV

timelineItems.name: Kade Wimberley
timelineItems.text: #DTID http://t.co/gKeaSBZZSV

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Anyone know if Morgan Stanley is hiring? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: I'm not quite refined enough to always know when it's the D line's fault, or the GK, but I think there's enough blame to go around. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dools
timelineItems.text: Every time the #nerevs turn the ball over for no reason, I drink. Apologies to my wife, daughter, and cat.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #nerevs going 4-1-4-1 acc. to MLS Live with Bunbury on the right wing. This will be interesting #dalvne

timelineItems.name: Jessica Palafox
timelineItems.text: #pregame #celebration #drumline #soccer #fcdallas #mascot #longhorn #love #toyotastadium ⚽️�

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 39' - #NERevs currently at 53.9% possession, 87% passing accuracy, but struggling to create decent chances. #FCDallas #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: I'd rather see forward attacks that result in a goal kick than seeing mishandled balls into touch or never ending back pass resets. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: A goal before HT would be huge for #NERevs.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Blas Perez.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Je-Vaughn Watson rushes to respond to a Blas Perez cross, but sends it high and wide

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Stephen Keel (FC Dallas).
Attempt missed. Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Blas Pérez.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: And not surprisingly, #FCDallas drops numbers back to prevent possibility of conceding goal right before HT.

timelineItems.name: HilaryFojtasekCotton
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas with the boys! Gorgeous night! @live2beone #fcdallas #dtid #Frisco #Obedient #noble #elite http://t.co/n2GrPCSolr

timelineItems.name: Steve Himmer
timelineItems.text: Stages of watching the #NEREvs: 1) wait for the early goal concession; 2) hope it doesn’t get worse; 3) hope it doesn’t get worse again

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Blas Pérez (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Revs fans were trying to convince me that Jose Goncalves was the problem. Um, no. Team still can't create danger zone chances. #DALvNE

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, FC Dallas 1, New England Revolution 0.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: For the 7th straight game, #NERevs go into halftime with a deficit. How do you recycle the same message in the locker room?

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins FC Dallas 1, New England Revolution 0.

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: No changes for #FCDallas…Hedges appears fine.

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: @NESoccerToday Striker unable to get involved. Where have I heard this story before? Except every year since I began watching 'em. #NERevs

timelineItems.title: FC Dallas vs. New England Revolution July 19, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.text: #NERevs get something going and then a horrible pass behind a streaking Tierney. #FacePalm

timelineItems.text: Perez tracking back on defense early after Hernandez gives the ball away in the midfield. #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Alex W
timelineItems.text: Don't get it. #NERevs consistently play with long striker with his back to goal, yet, we have zero who can play that role. Am I wrong here?

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs dodge a couple of bullets to start the half. Sloppy passing/defending to begin the half.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Andrés Escobar.

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Looks like Mullins is going to come in first for #NERevs.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Might as well take off a D for an F on the road. Not like the D is doing much for you. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Moises Hernandez.

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | AFC NYC
timelineItems.text: I think I could make this #NERevs if I was still in shape... Haha.

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: Sure would be nice if the wide midfielder thought about defending #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Charlie's subbing out? Understand the fitness aspect, but still not a fan. #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adam Moffat (FC Dallas).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Neumann has to put that actually OVER the defense. Ugh. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jon Strauss
timelineItems.text: Back from shopping. Glad I missed the first half, because apparently I've hit more Targets than any of our team during this match. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Imagine Davies would play better with a partner. Did some good stuff with his back to the goal but found it difficult past that #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies scored in his first start with #DCU. What will he do in his first start with the #NERevs?

timelineItems.name: Ray Curren
timelineItems.text: Jay Heaps has the look of someone throwing random things against the wall hoping something will stick at the moment. #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Excited to see Pat Mullins & Steve Neumann, MLS' brightest young bromance, share the same field for most of the 2nd half in Frisco. #DALvNE

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth amazing stop on ground-shaking blast from Tesho Akindele

Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Robbie Bowen
timelineItems.text: How was this defense #1 in the league last year #MLS #NERevs

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | AFC NYC
timelineItems.text: Good save? Bobby should've held onto that - it was right at him. Would have been easier if he didn't try to cheat. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Stephen McCarthy.

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Oh god is it 2011 again? “Just punt it out the back for a corner, nothing bad can come of that.” #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Scott Caldwell.
Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Amazed at the complete lack of counterattack by the #nerevs. Strategy is to have GK hold ball and then roll it to a D. WTF?

timelineItems.name: a_sakowski
timelineItems.text: The Revs kinds look like I'm controlling them in fifa. I don't know which buttons do what. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Small Time Sports
timelineItems.text: Feels like the game is being played in the NE penalty area. Need to get it in the net. #DTID

timelineItems.name: Irma Fernandez
timelineItems.text: Hey @TealBunB and @CharlieDavies9, as a #USMNT fan, happy to finally see y'all play tonight here at the #DALvNE match. Much love!

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Fagundez coming on for #NERevs last sub. #FCDallas still has all three left to use.

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: Part of the revs problems at the moment stem from the fact they're playing 4 central midfielders. Its leaving the fullbacks exposed #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Matt Hedges.

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: #nerevs are holding possession for the first time in months.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Interesting foul by Barnes. Very high up the field #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Thank God we didn't start Charlie and Diego up front. #nerevs That would've made sense

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.

timelineItems.name: Dools
timelineItems.text: Jay Heaps patented 4-6-0 offense down a goal. You know what to do #nerevs fans… DRINK

timelineItems.comment: Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: “Another good save?” Give me a break. Right at him. He needs to catch it, not deflect it to the top of the box. #NERevs @RevsTV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Matt Hedges.
Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: Morgan DaSilva 
timelineItems.text: This slump the #NERevs are going through is just plain sad and annoying.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth masterful goalkeeping

timelineItems.name: Morgan DaSilva 
timelineItems.text: If possible I'd love for Heaps to try a 4-3-3 for a game. I feel like we might not have the depth but at this point its worth a shot #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Patrick Mullins.

timelineItems.name: Alex DeJong
timelineItems.text: #NERevs simply playing with no speed. too slow in the attack and getting beaten by speed in the defense.

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: I don't remember #NERevs being the least bit threatening tonight. But I'm also playing solitaire, so my attentions divided.

timelineItems.comment: Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Chris Tierney (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: I can have 100% posession if I keep it on my own end also. #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodwin
timelineItems.text: This team is lost out there.... #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Ive watched the #nerevs since 1996. I can deal with losing but I can't deal with a lack of effort.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Stephen McCarthy.

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Great ball by Tierney to the near post. Number of #NERevs rushing to meet it: zero. #mls

timelineItems.name: DC Revs Fan
timelineItems.text: Not even angry. This is just sad. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: MLS Nerd
timelineItems.text: Pass the ball to Mullins already so he doesn't hurt someone #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: Ginger Beard
timelineItems.text: By my count its 5-2 in favor of Dallas in the box. Get in the box! This is ridiculous #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Tierney was the best #NERevs player on Wednesday. Dude is doing his part tonight as well. Got to be frustrating.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Jose is injured in the same way Tom Brady is questionable with a shoulder injury. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: #FCDallas has to be sharpening their knives after seeing Macca cramp up like that. Midfield has to step its game up.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Steve Neumann.

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodwin
timelineItems.text: Maybe next game Knighton should get a start.... #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Steve Himmer
timelineItems.text: Hard to watch the #NERevs without thinking they’ve been plain outstripped by the development of @MLS elsewhere.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs lost 11 of 34 games last year; they're about to lose their 10th game in the 19th match of this season. #MLS #DALvNE

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies is the best striker we have at holding possession. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: So far, so good for #NERevs. Controlling tempo well, no need to score 5 goals right off the bat.

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: How do all of our defensive recoveries end up at the feet of the opponent? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Alex DeJong
timelineItems.text: I swear the #NERevs look like a damn pick-up team a couple of guys trying to do everything and nothing really connecting.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  FC Dallas 2, New England Revolution 0. Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Tesho Akindele gets past Andrew Farrell and puts it away beautifully

timelineItems.name: Jason Chalifour
timelineItems.text: If FC Dallas was better this would be 3-0. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Of course this is three minutes. Wasted one just now with that sub. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Small Time Sports
timelineItems.text: Akindele puts it away! What a rookie season he is having. 2-0 #DTID

timelineItems.name: Milton Link
timelineItems.text: Well that does it...... The slide continues. #NERevs Game over.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Adam Moffat.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: ALL WE DO IS LOSE, LOSE, LOSE NO MATTER WHAT! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: #MLS Superdraft here we come! #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Andrew Farrell with a headed pass.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Mauro Diaz (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth heroically leaps for it in final seconds

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, FC Dallas 2, New England Revolution 0.
Attempt saved. Mauro Díaz (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tesho Akindele.
